name: World of Hyrule
description:
Based on the Legend of Zelda, Ocarina of Time. Areas covered so far:



\-Kokiri Forest

\-Lost Woods

\-Hyrule Field

\-Lon Lon Ranch



Custom models imported from various sources. Credits go to:



\-Blizzard Entertainment

\-"println" for Blender m3addon

\-"Jeromnimo" for WoW model viewer and its m3 exporter

\-Thomas Glamsch for Blender MDL importer

\-"Zerox" from the Hive Workshop for the Spiritual Stones, Young Link and The Great Deku Tree models

\-"Caeyra" from the Hive WorkshopÂ for the Princess Zelda texture



Users are free to modify this map for adding/customizing game modes, I only request credits for the Kokiri Houses, Kokiri Tunnels, and the terrain.
author: ranchburner
